concept.title: What's changed in version 1.2.0.1
concept.shortdesc: Understand the changes that are delivered as part of version 1.2.0.1

dlentry.dt: The Maximum connections property is deprecated
dlentry.dd: The Maximum connections property of the LDAP connection configuration object is deprecated.

RC4 ciphers are no longer supported. Support for the following ciphers is withdrawn:
ECDHE-RSA-RC4-SHA
ECDHE-ECDSA-RC4-SHA
AECDH-RC4-SHA
ADH-RC4-MD5
ECDH-RSA-RC4-SHA
ECDH-ECDSA-RC4-SHA
RC4-SHA RC4-MD5
RC4-MD5 PSK-RC4-SHA
